markdown:
Deep gnome warriors are quick to charge into battle but focus on defending their kin and their homes over more aggressive tactics when a choice is available. **[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 16 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 14 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 11 [Deep Gnome Warrior](/Monsters.aspx?ID=94) **Source** [Bestiary](/Sources.aspx?ID=2) pg. 75 **Perception** +7; darkvision **Languages** [Gnomish](/Languages.aspx?ID=5), [Undercommon](/Languages.aspx?ID=11) **Skills** [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +8, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +5, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +5 **Str** +4 **Dex** +2 **Con** +3 **Int** +0 **Wis** +1 **Cha** -1 **Items** [Studded Leather Armor](/Armor.aspx?ID=5), [Heavy Crossbow](/Weapons.aspx?ID=70) (20 bolts), [steel shield](/Shields.aspx?ID=3) (Hardness 5, HP 20, BT 10) --- **AC** 18 (20 with shield raised) **Fort** +9 **Ref** +8 **Will** +5 **HP** 34 **Attack of Opportunity**
**Shield Block** --- **Speed** 20 feet **Melee** spear +10, **Damage** 1d6+4 piercing **Ranged** heavy crossbow +8 ([range increment 120 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248), [reload 2](/Traits.aspx?ID=254)), **Damage** 1d10 piercing **Primal Innate Spells** DC 15 - **1st** [Illusory Disguise](/Spells.aspx?ID=159)
name: Deep Gnome Warrior
